main.name: William W
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Hey! My name is William and I'm an incoming Junior Software Engineering student at UWaterloo. I'm experienced in full-stack web development and machine learning methodology through various internships, side projects and a reearch position! I love to travel. In fact, my first coop term took place at a start-up in Shanghai called Hikedu Inc. I also like to workout and meet new people! Recently, I picked up voice acting as a hobby so I might link a video to this site later ;)
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Senior UX God

work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

projects.title: Manga Colorizer
projects.category: An encoder-decoder neural network that automatically colorizes your manga pages. Now we can have the detail of manga and the color of webtoons.

projects.title: Privacy Policy Index
projects.category: Webapp that uses machine learning to judge the strength of privacy policies on a scale from 1 to 5.

projects.title: Fake News Detector
projects.category: Machine Learning model that detects fake news.

projects.title: Super Smash Bros USA
projects.category: It looks like a fighting game. But it's not. You pick a politician and it uses Microsoft Azure's Video Indexer to return video timestamps where he/she discusses major topics.

projects.title: AA Alarm Clock
projects.category: Alarm Clock: "Okay William, time to get out of bed. What is 34 x 8?" "Me: Uhh...hmmm? " Alarm Clock: "WHAT IS 34 x 8?" Me: "AGHHHH" *chucks phone across room

projects.title: Logistica Politica
projects.category: A webapp that analyzes twitter data to predict mood and political affiliation.

projects.title: CanvasTO
projects.category: Have you ever played Clash of Clans? This is Clash of Clans, but you build Toronto. It's a Sim City-type game where you manage your own virtual Toronto. We didn't get too far in the project but we learned a lot about Android Dev and Frontend/Backend methodology.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
